channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Microsoft Windows Cyberattack Warning — Do Not Open These Files
item.description: You have been warned — do not open these highly dangerous Windows files.
